title: There is absolutely no point in building ROA over Hextech GLP-800
body: ROA provides you 20 more AP and 200 more HP, it gives you the same amount of mana and eternity passive, the difference is you have to wait for ROA to stack to get up to the similar stats of GLP and GLP has a burst active of 200 + 35% AP with a mini slow that is a lot more useful 20 AP will ever give you during your spell rotations.
